nodes.text: Dry Gulch was a settlement in the southern hemisphere of the planet Savareen where an independent coaxium refinery was located. By 10 BBY, the Bellwing Gang had been harrasing Dry Gulch over the refinery, and the locals hired the mercenary Gallandro to deal with the gang. The offered payement was 10,000 credits, but Gallandro's crew was allowed to tap the raw coaxium. Gallandro's employee Loonoo recorded the details of the Dry Gulch job in the Smuggler's Guide logbook.
